original_text: He dealt shrewdly with our race and forced our fathers to expose their infants, so that they would not be kept alive.
korean_text: 그가 우리 족속에게 교활한 방법을 써서 조상들을 괴롭게 하여 그 어린 아이들을 내버려 살지 못하게 하려 할새

sentences.original_text: He dealt shrewdly with our race
and forced our fathers to expose their infants
so that they would not be kept alive.
